header.v: Thông tin mã nguồn, mã chứng từ và loại chứng từ không hợp lệ.
header.e: The inspection lot origin, voucher code and voucher type are invalid.

field.name: ma_ct
field.check: ma_ct <> '' and ma_ct not in (select ma_ct from bikdngct)

field.name: loai_ct
field.check: loai_ct <> '' and loai_ct not in (select loai_ct from bikdngct b where b.ma_ct = @@table.ma_ct)

processing.text: if @@admin = 0 and @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, 'BIInspectionLotOrigin', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end declare @message nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000), @existsGroup nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(4000), @irregular nvarchar(4000), @irregularChars varchar(128), @field varchar(32), @r int, @d datetime select @irregularChars = &IrregularValue;, @d = getDate() select @irregular = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell có chứa các ký tự: ' + @irregularChars else 'The value of cell %invalidCell contains any of the following characters: ' + @irregularChars end select @duplicate = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell &Nested.Message.v;.' else 'The value of cell %invalidCell is &Nested.Message.e;.' end select @existsGroup = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Thông tin mã chứng từ %s1 và loại chứng từ %s2 tại dòng %s3 không hợp lệ.' else 'The voucher code %s1 and voucher type %s2 at row %s3 are invalid.' end create index i on @@table (ma_nguon) -- Delete if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a join bikddmnguon b on a.ma_nguon = b.ma_nguon -- Checking &Checking; select @field = 'ma_nguon' if @$mode = 1 begin &IrregularMessage; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select @field, stt, @message from @@table where ma_nguon like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%' &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table where ma_nguon like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%'&Irregular; end if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_ct', stt, 'C001' from @@table a join (select ma_ct, loai_ct from @@table group by ma_ct, loai_ct having count(1) > 1) b on a.ma_ct = b.ma_ct and a.loai_ct = b.loai_ct &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_ct', stt, 'C001' from @@table a join bikddmnguon b on a.ma_ct = b.ma_ct and a.loai_ct = b.loai_ct and a.ma_nguon <> b.ma_nguon &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table group by ma_ct, loai_ct having count(1) > 1 if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(replace(@existsGroup, '%s1', ma_ct), '%s2', loai_ct), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end select @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a join bikddmnguon b on a.ma_ct = b.ma_ct and a.loai_ct = b.loai_ct and a.ma_nguon <> b.ma_nguon if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(replace(@existsGroup, '%s1', ma_ct), '%s2', loai_ct), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end -- Gather select a.* into #k from @@table a join bikddmnguon b on a.ma_nguon = b.ma_nguon delete @@table from @@table a join #k b on a.ma_nguon = b.ma_nguon -- Checking select @field = 'ma_nguon' &Nested.Key.b; if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, ''00003'' from @@table a, @@table b with (index(i)) where a.ma_nguon <> b.ma_nguon and a.ma_nguon like rtrim(b.ma_nguon) + ''%'' &w1;@field&w2;a.stt&w3;''00003''&w4; group by a.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, a.stt, ''00003'' from @@table a, bikddmnguon b with (index(PK_bikddmnguon)) where a.ma_nguon like rtrim(b.ma_nguon) + ''%'' &w1;@field&w2;a.stt&w3;''00003''&w4; group by a.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; select @q = '&InsertErrorTable; select @field, b.stt, ''00003'' from bikddmnguon a, @@table b with (index(i)) where a.ma_nguon like rtrim(b.ma_nguon) + ''%'' &w1;@field&w2;b.stt&w3;''00003''&w4; group by b.stt' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@field varchar(32)', @field &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @q = 'select top 1 @r = a.stt from @@table a, @@table b with (index(i)) where a.ma_nguon <> b.ma_nguon and a.ma_nguon like rtrim(b.ma_nguon) + ''%''' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; select top 1 @r = a.stt from @@table a, bikddmnguon b with (index(PK_bikddmnguon)) where a.ma_nguon like rtrim(b.ma_nguon) + '%'&Duplicate; select @q = 'select top 1 @r = b.stt from bikddmnguon a, @@table b with (index(i)) where a.ma_nguon like rtrim(b.ma_nguon) + ''%''' exec sp_executesql @q, N'@r int output', @r = @r output&Duplicate; end end &EndErrorMode; -- Insert &Inserting; -- Update if @type = '1' begin &ListWhenBeforeImportUpdateLog; &Updating; end
